name: SHADE (dual_lasagna)
description:
Controls

  • MOVE: A D
  • DASH: SHIFT
  • ATTACK: K
  • SHIELD/BLOCK : L

Blocking/Shielding : Perfect timing can protect yourself and deal damage to enemy (But cant finish them off), late blocks can only protect you. 

Sound effects Generated from sfxr and sound tracks is from One Man Symphony. This game is inspired by Grave by HeartBeast.
